briefDescription: Comanche man doll. Cloth doll with embroidered features, black coarse thread hair in two braids. Dressed in white buckskin mocassins with silver button trim; heavily fringed and lightly beaded leggings; red felt breechclout; white buckskin shirt witha bit of beading; two stands of red beads around shoulders.
